section.title: Setting up your hosts
section.para: It is increadibly important that the host hardware is identical with respect to the processors, number of network interface cards (NICs), and the way the network is setup on all hosts.

section.title: Hypervisor Software
section.para:
CloudStack currently supports the following hypervisor software versions:
Hypervisor Software Versions

listitem.para: KVM x (on RHEL/CentOS 5.6 (64-bit), RHEL6 (64-bit), Fedora 14 (64-bit), and Ubuntu 10.04 LTS (64-bit)

section.title: Host Capacity and Overprovisioning
section.para: Host capacity should generally be modeled in terms of RAM for the guests. Storage and CPU may be overprovisioned. RAM may not. RAM is usually the limiting factor in capacity designs.
